chapter.title: Advanced Packaging
chapter.para: This section should introduce more advanced tools and concepts. Topics such as using puiparts, packaging libraries and multiple binaries. Maybe something on meta packages as well.

sect1.title: Multiple Binary Packages
sect1.para: If your source package produces more than one binary package, you'll need a way to get the correct files into the different packages.
This is where .install files come in.

sect1.title: Creating a Source Package Using CDBS
sect1.para: This section should give an example of using the Common Debian Build System (CDBS).
